column18: A belt-mounted apparatus that generates a protection forcefield.
These shades make it easier to see, and look cool while doing so.
An ancient device that projects battle data on a holographic overlay that covers one eye.
Armor made of leather, with enhanced durability.
Leather jacket and jeans, basic attire suited for wanderers of the hellscape.
Legends say that tight-fitting garments like these were worn by the greatest heroes of ancient times. (I'd be skeptical of that claim.)
Hooded robes made of colored cloth.
